# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
discord.js v14
| Version | Recommended        |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.4.8   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.4.8 | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability
under v1.4.8 theres some security issues, if you using discord-afk-js under version 1.4.8. please update it to latest version
```
npm i discord-afk-js@latest
```
